So there's a few things about this game I want to keep short and sweet.

Pros
1. There are a ton of ways to customize your play style with no strict 1 way of doing things.
2. Fun with friends, can fool around and test builds or work as a team to try and stomp the killer.
3. Cool way to play with/against different villains from a variety of iconic horror movies/games.

Cons
1. Solo queue survivor sucks big time.
2. If you are new to the game as a killer, you will probably find the game miserable if you aren't facing rank 20 survivors.
3. There are ALWAYS BUGS AND ERRORS! EVERY UPDATE BASICALLY BREAKS THE GAME FOR AT LEAST A DAY OR TWO.

Overall, I have fun playing with my friends and recommend it as a fun team game. It's entertaining to watch.

This game may seem scary, but it's overall a very funny and fun game to play. You may struggle at the start but over time it will get better. This game is one of the funnest games I've ever played. And would recommend this to people who are bored. The 30 GIG upload is definitely worth it. :)
